choices: One of the leading crew members
1.content:
"Commander Reiko Yushida on deck!" A young woman spoke. Her black hair was tied back in a ponytail, her dark red eyes stern. She wore a dark blue long coat over a black one piece swimsuit, holding a Katana at her side. "All crew, sound off!"

"Helmsman Valentina Reporting!" A girl with short blonde hair spoke up. She was completely naked, yet had not a care in the world who saw her.

"Gunnery Officer Maris Suruk Reporting!" A buff Amazo called.

"Navigator Tachyon Omicron-334 Reporting." said a blue, florescent figure of a nude woman. She hovered a few inches above the ground, her voice ringing softly with each word.

"Communications Officer Nia Catarl standing by, nya." a blonde Nekoko chimed, her tail giving a little swish.

"Science Officer Karin Edison Reporting." a girl with long dark green hair stated, pushing her glasses up the bridge of her nose.

"Chief Medical Officer Miyotaka On deck nya." Spoke another Nekoko, this one with pink hair, a little earring in one of her cat-like ears.

"Armory Chief Tia Norkek waitin' t'kick some ass." An Amazo with bright red hair smirked, cracking her knuckles.

"Chief Engineer Tali reporting." a tiny, white-haired android girl spoke up, saluting her commander as she walked by.

"Science Officer Gwenivier awaiting your command." A second android, this one a young adult in appearance, stated, speaking with a monotone British accent.

"Security Chief Tsuka Standing by." A young, meek looking Amazo with gold earrings nodded.

"Tactical Officers Nagi and Nata reporting!" twin girls with matching braids spoke in unison.

"Executive Officer Sonya Detweiler reporting. All hands accounted for. We launch on your order, Commander Yushida."


"Very well." The commander stated. "Helmsman Valentina, prepare for launch."

"Aye aye!" Valentina chimed, her boobs bouncing as she trotted to the front of the bridge, jumping on top of a platform at the very front, where she vanished into it, a holographic image of her appearing above the platform from which she had vanished. "All systems go, ma'am!"

"Engage!" Commander Yushida ordered. Musume-Tan took off from the ground, leaving Planet Onnachikyu.

"Take off successful." Valentina stated. "We will be within warp distance in T-minus one minute."

"Prepare the Tachyon Warp Drive." Reiko Yushida commanded.

"Preparing." The spectral form of Tachyon Omicron-334 nodded. "We are within warp range."

"Engage Warp Drive!"

"Engaging!" In a matter of seconds, the exploratory vessel became nothing more than a streak in the night sky, traveling at high speeds past the known territories of the galaxy. "Disengaging Tachyon Warp Drive in 5..." Valentina reported, counting down before cutting the Warp Drive.

Everyone aboard the Musume-Tan stared in awe at the sight before them; nebulas, stars, and many other astral projections lay before them, an incredible sight to behold.

"Our voyage has now officially begun." Reiko stated. "From this day forth, we, the women of the Musume-Tan, will let nothing, not even the Otakato, stand in our way, as we explore these deep, unexplored reaches of space!" The crew applauded and shouted their approval. "We have no idea what awaits us in this region, but no matter what, we stand strong! When danger approaches us, we will stand strong! If the Otakato endanger our lives, our freedom, we will stand strong! Now... everyone be ready as we take our first steps into the unknown. And stand strong!"

"YEAH!!!" The Musume-Tan shook as every single member of its crew shouted their applause.


And now, our story begins. But before that... who exactly are you?
1.title: Virgin Mission!

11.content:
With the Musume-Tan finally set off on its first mission, who of the leading crew members on the bridge should we follow now? we have:

-Captain Reiko Yushida, Commanding-Officer of the Musume-Tan. Human, long black hair in a ponytail with dark red eyes. A strong young woman who always ensures her crew and ship is in working order. Though she does keep a strict order, she is still quite kind-hearted, caring much for her crew, knowing their loyalty matters above all else. However, she is anything but perfect, and can fall apart under stress somewhat easily. To this extent, she does visit the Musume-Tan service team, a crew devoted to 'relieving' the Musume-Tan's crew's stresses, as she does perform best after being sexually satisfied. She is attracted to all women of all species.

-Valentina, the pilot/helmsman of the exploratory vessel. Human, with blond hair and hazel eyes. She pilots the ship with a full-body integration system, enabling her to guide the ship as though it were her own body, though of course this means that in order to guide the ship, she has to be naked. For this very reason, Valentina is a nudist, spending all hours of the day, piloting or not, in the nude. Though usually quiet and serious while piloting, she's a fairly playful, energetic person when not at the helm.

-Tachyon Omicron-344 (aka Tachyon, or Tachy for short), the ship's navigator. Celestral, with blue hair. Her people have omni-present awareness of all their surroundings, and can merge with others, organic or inanimate, granting them her abilities. She uses this ability as the Musume-Tan's navigator, enabling her to guide the ship through space very effectively. Though she's very much an organic being, many mistake her, due to her florescent form, as an AI, something that privately depresses her. She wishes to better know her crewmates, and hope that they can see her as more than a navigator.

-Sonya Detweiler, Executive Officer of the Musume-Tan. Human, with brown hair and eyes. Sonya's well known for her sense of order and control over her past vessels, and usually shows little interest in fun or amusement. Despite being very prudish, she is, in fact, a bit of a closet pervert. She occasionally pays discreet visits to the Musume-Tan's service team (reinforcing the point that the visit is to remain confidential with each visit), and usually falls to sleep masturbating.

-Nia Catarl, Communications Officer. Nekoko, blonde with blue eyes. Nekoko are already known for their good hearing, but nothing in the deep reaches of space get past Nia's (a)cute ears. She's a special kind of Nekoko, known as Tokumi, meaning that she can transfer her range of hearing to almost anywhere she wants. This enables her to hear inside any room on the Musume-Tan from the bridge, and even hear outside of the ship, despite scientific impossibilities. To this extent, she is somewhat of a voyeur, sometimes listening in on someone and easily able to picture in her mind the naughty events unfolding.
11.title: One of the leading crew members

"Ho ho? Another visit to the service team?" Nia giggled.

"Hm? Is something wrong, Communications Officer?" The captain asked.

"No, no, just thinking out loud." Nia lied, before returning her focus to the sound of the Executive Officer making love to some unknown attendant.

"Aw, damn it! I missed who she's having sex with today!" Nia pouted. It certainly sounded like Sonya was having fun with this mystery girl, though.

"Oh yes! Yes!!" Sonya cried ecstatically. "You're awfully sweet for an Amazo, and even more sexy!"

"Who says that?!" Nia snorted with laughter.

choices: Cathedral Terra, home to the Monostary of the Holy Virgins
11512.content:
"How about we get rid of these?" Sonya smirked, and Nia could hear the distinct rustling of clothes being removed. She was just to the good part, when suddenly....

An alarm went off at her front desk, and Nia's mind was flung back onto the bridge as she looked down to see a distress beacon

"Well... at least that's a good reason for cutting off my fun..." Nia thought. "Captain! We're receiving a distress beacon from one of the nearby planets! They're requesting immediate assistance!"

"Where's the signal coming from?" The captain asked.

13.content: Hmm a gaint ship full of weapons, mechs, and other advance machines their has to be a number of different crew members out thier so which section do you want to start with? If you have questions about a engineering job here ask and you shall recieve.
13.title: a member of engineering

133.content:
Headed by the young android T4L1-69, better known as Tali, The computer engineering crew is responsible for maintaining the computers, networking and software of the Musume-Tan. Though many might consider the job tedious (And sometimes, it can be), the organic software interface Tali invented herself proves to be the most advanced and sophisticated method of not only maintaining, but upgrading computer and networking technology.

The organic body is comparable to hardware, and the mind comparable to software. With this in mind, an organic engineer, be they human, Nekoko, android, or whatever, can plug directly into the Musume-Tan's network, controlling it from the inside. However, most engineers prefer to stray away from using this interface, as it requires the user to... plug themselves in through an orifice only members of the Onnachikyu federation own, and is specifically tailored so that only Musume-Tan crew members can use it.

There is far more to the computer engineering team, their technology, and their methods than simply the organic software interface, but we'll get to that later. First, who are you going to be?

-T4L1-69, aka Tali. Android, short white hair and green eyes. The head of computer engineering. Though she only appears to be about 8 years old, her computer engineering skills are second to none. However, beyond her penchant for software, Tali also has a fascination with Onnachikyu 'hardware.' She has a strong curiosity of organic anatomy, as they differ so much from her cybernetic body, despite how perfectly human she appears. Despite her fascination with organics, however, Tali only seems attracted to the other androids; specifically, the Musume-Tan science officer Gwenivier, whom she holds very strong sexual feelings towards, despite, as Gwenivier reminds her, the fact that they are, in technicality, 'sisters.'

-Parfait. Nekoko, Red-pink hair. Just by her name, you know Parfait has a big sweet tooth! And her personality is sweet and playful to boot. Despite being in computer engineering, Parfait was also recommended as a pilot for the Musume-Tan, though declined since she wouldn't be able to move freely as much she she would have liked. She's one of the first people Tali comes to when she has a question about organics' bodies, and has one of the strangest forms of computer power sources ever; twice everyday, the Musume-Tan's central terminal gives off a signal depicted by a single color. Parfait can provide extra power from the ship by wearing panties of the same color as the signal. Many refuse to use this style of generation, as it tends to exhaust them, but because of Parfait's boundless natural energy and abundant sweet tooth, she seems to power the central terminal for days on end without any problems at all.

There are a few other crew members of the computer engineering team, but that's all for now.

"She even seems to enjoy it!" The first engineer noted, flabergasted, as Tali's face turned slightly pink, a look of ecstasy on her face. "Androids really are something else!"

134.content:
It was just the start of the ships first month of travel when a certain human by the name of Jessica was at work in her lab. For those wondering, jessica is both a scientist and a medical doctor. She has to make sure things like neural implants or any other living machine was functioning at 100%. Well, usually, but that wasn't the only thing she did.

"Hehehe. Finally, time to work on my little project." she said grabbing a few test tubes filled with nekoko, amazo, and alphazo blood. You see, her department worked on cloning. As well, the rules are very loose on this; Just three; only create replacement parts, don't clone a person unless allowe\d by the family, and never ever clone a man. Technically, she wasn't breaking these rules; she was making a new assistant.

"Alright since both miss Tali and miss Miyotaka have 'signed' for this, lets begin. Okay, first take a drop of blood, and take a sample of genetic code..."she said to herself. Her plan was to do a basic clone and insert a few memories she had created. She start extracting the codes she believed would give her the skin and muscular form of the Amazo, the body of the Nekoko, and the abilities of the Alphazo, hopefully giving her a perfect creature. Although, not much was heard of inbreeding between any of the other species on the ship, so she hoped it would work.

Anyway, she isolated the few genes she thought where right, and started to connect and perfect them, placing them in the cloning pod and began, only to hear a knock on the door. It opened, to have miss Miyotaka walk in with a girl in her early teens.

"Miss LaRuffa, I brought with me the assistant you asked... What are you doing?" she asked looking at the test tubes and active pod with what looked like a fast growing child in it.

"Um... Well, you see, I was doing an experiment of my own, and well, then clone the outcome ehh hehe?" honestly, she was kinda sweating like a fat kid after running a mile in the summer heat. She was nervous; even though it was legal to do this, some disapprove of cloning via religion or just believing it's wrong.

But honestly, I'm wondering the doc's view on this.
134.title: basicly artifical replacements.

Now then... what kind of crew member are you?

143132.content:
"Got one!" Lily shouted triumphantly.

"Don't get cocky." Aisha smirked, lining up her shot on another ship. "There's still two left..." Just as she was about to pull the trigger, Lilly blasted it to bits.

"Make that one...." But upon these words, an entire Otakato Armada disengaged their cloaking devices, making the three soldiers look and feel like ants in comparison. "...thousand." Lilly finished, her mouth gaping wide open.

"Captain! Massive enemy fleet ahead! Recommend immediate evasion!" Valentina, the helmsman, stated.

"Right." Captain Reiko Yushida nodded, sending a transmission to the pilots. "This is Captain Yushida! Disengage and return to the ship! Repeat: Disengage!"

Tuska stared in fright at the mass of ships, before wetting herself. "R-roger that!" She blurted, quick to get away. Lily and Aisha, unfortunately, weren't so quick, nor so lucky, a bunch of Otakato mechs surrounding them.

"Maris! Diversionary fire!" Captain Yushida ordered quickly.

"You got it!" Maris Suruk, gunnery officer, confirmed. "Take this, you wiener-crotched bastards!!!"

Ships across the Otakato armada scattered as a maelstrom of gunfire burst from the Musume-Tan. Some of the fire even gave Lily just the time she needed to make some adjustments.

"Whoa! Williams, what are you doing?!" Aisha asked.

"What's it look like? Setting this thing to detonate. It's useless now anyway." Williams answered.

"That's insane! You're not blowing yourself up!"

"No, I'm not." Williams crossed her arms, waiting for the Battle Frame to fully engage. Her clothes burst off completely as her seating transformed, giving her a form of revealing armor. "Flight Battle Frame! Ignition!!" Just seconds before the explosion of her mech, Lilly Y Williams ejected herself from it, wearing what seemed to be a simple suit of armor, rigged with some heavy infantry weaponry, the destruction of her mech blowing away all the Otakato ships holding her down.

"You're not taking me that easily, Y-chromo-bitches!!!" Williams cried out, guns blazing relentlessly on some more oncoming ships.

"Williams! We're retreating, not fighting a war!" Aisha reminded her, jettisoning and activating her own Battle Frame, though unleashed a flurry of missiles to aid her escape.

"Right!"

The two made a mad dash for the Musume-Tan's hangar, one of them occasionally turning to stop oncoming ships from catching up to them, before they crashlanded in the hangar, both of them crashing and burning, their Battle Frames taking some damage from their long, skidding slide across the hangar, until they were both stopped by the foot of a mech.

"Our pilots are now aboard. All crew accounted for." Tachyon Omicron-344, the ship's overseer and navigator stated.

"Helmsman! Get us the hell outta here!" Captain Yushida commanded.

"Don't wait around on my account!" Valentina said jokingly before engaging the Tachyon Warp Drive, evading the armada entirely. Moments later, she disengaged to clear night sky. A brief pause, before... "Evasion successful." Crew members of the Musume-Tan where either taking a big breath of relief, or cheering.


"Well..." That was wild." Aisha sighed.

"Yeah..." Lily panted. "I hope something like that never happens again."

"Yeah..." Tuska sighed, laying next to them, her one piece bathing suit for a flight uniform still wet with her frightened pee. "I hope I can get to my mech's bathroom next time I get scared."

"I keep telling you not to drink so much before an assignment." Lily groaned.

"I got something you can drink, Williams! Bow-chika-wow-wow!" Aisha smirked.

"Shut it, Konata!!!" Lilly barked.
143132.title: The enemy mech got reinforcements.

14313211111.content:
"What the hell, Sarge?" Dawkens grunted.

"Yeah! What the hell is a guy doing on board this ship!?" Williams demanded. "You know they're the enemy."

"Hey!" Dawkens said indignantly.

"Fuck off, hot dog." Williams scoffed. "Seriously sarge, who thought this was an okay thing to do?"

"XO Sonya Detweiler Armory Cheif Tia Nortek, and Captain Reiko Yushida herself, that's who." Sarge replied. "If you got a problem with it, take it up with one of them. Now move your scrawny ass, cupcake! I want boots on the ground in no more than 30 minutes!"



"So... you're a guy, huh?" Konata grinned, her Nekoko tail swishing with excitement. "Where did you come from? You weren't from the Otakato Empire, were you?"

"Actually, I'm from one of the South Colonies." Dawkens answered, his armored chestplate removed, revealing his very muscular physique.

"Never heard of them." Tuska blinked.

"You never heard of Nekoko either, so I can't say I'm surprised." Lily muttered, giving Tuska's feline ear a tug.

"They're a few parsecs outside of Onnachikyu Federation territory." Dawkens clarified. "The conflict between Onnachikyu and Otakato doesn't exist out there, and while women out number the population of men considerably, we're at least equal in our rights. From what I understand, that does not so much seem to be the case on the Musume-Tan..." He remembered getting a lot of angry or disgusted looks from the other crewmates, Lily Williams' being just one of those.

"And that's life subtly telling you that you have no place on an Onnachikyu starship." Lily scoffed, changing into her uniform away from the man's prying eyes. Konata, on the other hand, seemed to have no problem with such modesties, as she changed right in front of Dawkens without any problem at all. "Tuska, go change somewhere where dicks here can't see your ass." Lily spoke up.

"He can't." Tuska said, her back turned to the boy. "He can't see me; I can't see him."

"That's because he's behind you."

"Oh..." Tuska blinked, turning around, then finishing changing on the other side of the lockers.

"Dipshit." Lily rolled her eyes.

"Don't mind them. They just aren't used to being around men who aren't trying to shoot them." Konata reasoned.

"Uh, right..." Dawkens muttered.


"Ladies! Front and center on the double!" The Sarge demanded. "Now, the ship is touching down within the next ten minutes."

"What's happening, sir... er, ma'am?" Dawkens asked.
14313211111.title: Move it dumbasses!

Awesome." The male and Tuska said, in spite of her not knowing what she was saying.

info.brief_description: Traveling through space has never been quite so sexy!
info.description:
Welcome aboard the Starship Musume-Tan! You, and the rest of the Musume-Tan's crew hail from the Onnachikyu Federation, a galactic alliance forged between female races across the known galaxy. Though the Musume-Tan was built by and mainly run by humans, other races, including Nekoko, a race of cute girls with cat-like ears and tails, Amazo, a strong, energetic race of darker-skinned women with a passion for physical competition, and many others are and soon will be members of the crew that run this vessel.

This is an exploratory vessel crafted to explore the uncharted regions of the galaxy, all the while fighting the tyranny of the the evil Otakato Empire, a fierce male-dominated empire, where men stand dominant over all other species, who are slaves and thralls to their iron-fisted might.

Today, the journey eternities in the making will begin! Today, the Starship Musume-Tan begins its virgin mission, and you're on board to see it all happen!

Please no weight gain, guro, or killing of main characters.
